name: AddTargetToGoal
description:
Add a target to a specific goal in ClickUp.

Use this tool to add a key result target to an existing goal in ClickUp, enhancing goal tracking and achievement.

parameters.name: goal_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the goal to which the target will be added.

parameters.name: target_name
parameters.description: Specify the name for the target being added to the goal. It should be a descriptive label for easy identification.

parameters.name: target_owners_ids
parameters.description: An array of user IDs representing the owners of the key result target.

parameters.name: target_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of target (key result) as one of the following: `number`, `currency`, `boolean`, `percentage`, or `automatic`.

parameters.name: initial_value_steps
parameters.description: Specify the starting value for the target's progress steps, as an integer.

parameters.name: target_steps_end
parameters.description: Specify the final value for the target steps. It indicates the goal completion threshold.

parameters.name: target_unit
parameters.description: Specify the unit for the target if using types like number, currency, or percentage.

parameters.name: linked_task_ids
parameters.description: An array of task IDs to associate the target with tasks.

value_schema.description: Enter an array of task IDs to link this target with one or more tasks.

parameters.name: list_ids
parameters.description: Array of List IDs to associate the target with multiple Lists.

value_schema.description: Enter an array of List IDs to link this target with one or more Lists.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: task_ids
parameters.description: Enter an array of task IDs to link this target with one or more tasks.

value_schema.description: Enter an array of task IDs to link this target with one or more tasks.

parameters.name: list_ids
parameters.description: Enter an array of List IDs to link this target with one or more Lists.

value_schema.description: Enter an array of List IDs to link this target with one or more Lists.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
